Clients

Class CompanyFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • Clients.ClientFacade
      • Clients.CompanyFacade

  • public class CompanyFacade
extends ClientFacade
    object returned when user logs in as Company. in charge of login and DBDAO actions for companies.
    See Also:
    Company, Coupon, LoginManager

      • addCoupon

        public void addCoupon(Coupon coupon)
        adds a new coupon to the DB.

        this also checks for coupon validity of date or duplication.

        Parameters:
        coupon - the new coupon to be added to the DB
        Throws:
        coupon - already exists
        coupon - starts after it expired
        coupon - already expired
        See Also:
        couponsDBDAO, Coupon

      • updateCoupon

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        coupon - does not exist
        See Also:

      • deleteCoupon

        public void deleteCoupon(Coupon coupon)
        removes a coupon from the DB.

        this also removes any coupons purchased by customers

        Parameters:
        coupon - the coupon to be removed from the DB
        Throws:
        coupon - does not exist!
        See Also:
        couponsDBDAO, Coupon
